figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption:
Flow chart of inclusion process in accordance with Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses guidelines.
Note. ROM = range of motion.

claims.sentence: After raising queries using the search terms “perilunate dislocation” OR “perilunate fracture dislocation” OR “perilunate,” 611 articles were extracted (Figure 1).
The remaining 58 full-text articles were evaluated for inclusion; 29 were excluded from the full-text analysis, and 29 were included for final analysis (Figure 1).
